goal.ch: 本課程介紹臺灣戰後重要的女作家及其作品，文類以小說和散文為主，進一步研討當前學者對臺灣女作家群的研究。另外，也參酌近幾年來對於多元議題的探究，包括女性、性別、母職、歷史、國族寫作等，藉由共同討論、個人報告和論文撰寫，理解戰後不同世代女作家的書寫風貌。另外，也共同與同學閱讀世界知名女作家作品，透過研討方式，認識當今女作家關心的普遍議題。
goal.en: This course introduces important postwar Taiwanese women writers and their works, mainly in the genres of fiction and prose, and further examines current scholarly research on Taiwan's women writers. In addition, the course also takes into account the diverse issues that have been explored in recent years, including women, gender, motherhood, history, and national writing. Through joint discussions, individual reports, and writing papers, the course aims to understand the writing styles of different generations of postwar women writers. In addition, we will read  the works of world-renowned women writers and learn about the common issues of concern to women writers today.
